<Text: The toilet circuit is the network of small music venues in the United Kingdom which rising indie, rock and metal bands often visit to gain support and promote themselves.>
Triplets:<The toilet circuit
1:
--------------------
Text: Toilet circuit:  It is so named after the Tunbridge Wells Forum, a staple venue of the toilet circuit, which is actually a public toilet converted into a venue.

Triplets:<Tunbridge Wells Forum

--------------------
Text: Toilet circuit:  Most of Britain's large towns and cities are home to at least one toilet circuit venue, although a regular toilet-circuit tour is only around 20 dates long at the most, meaning not all of the said venues are present in all toilet-circuit tours.
